Index.title: MyTesLab

Index.welcome_desc: Real-time 3D preview of high-precision wrap designs. Download your favorite styles for free.

Footer.tagline: The ultimate studio for custom Tesla wrap designs
Footer.disclaimer: We are an independent third-party creative platform and are not affiliated with, associated with, or endorsed by Tesla, Inc.

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.s1_content: By accessing or using MyTeslaLab (the "Platform"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. This Platform is operated by MyTeslaLab to provide AI-driven digital creative tools for Tesla owners.
tos.s2_content: The Platform provides AIGC (Generative AI) technology for users to generate, upload, preview, and download digital sticker designs. All products are digital assets; no physical goods are delivered.
tos.s3_ownership_content: You retain ownership of original materials uploaded and AI works generated via the Platform.
tos.s3_uploads_content: You warrant that you own legal rights to all uploaded content. Uploading content that infringes on third-party copyrights, trademarks, or privacy is strictly prohibited.
tos.s3_sharing_content: By selecting to "Publicly Publish" your work, you grant the Platform and all other users worldwide a perpetual, royalty-free, irrevocable, and non-exclusive license to download, display, modify, and use such content.
tos.s3_license_content: You grant us the necessary rights to store, host, and display your content to provide our services.
tos.s4_content: We respect intellectual property. If a rights holder finds infringing content on the Platform, please email support@myteslab.com with: 1) Proof of rights and contact info; 2) Specific URL(s) of the infringing content; 3) A statement made in good faith. Upon a valid notice, we will follow a "Notice-and-Takedown" procedure. Repeat infringers will have their accounts permanently terminated.
tos.s5_content: MyTeslaLab is an independent third-party platform and is not affiliated with, associated with, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Tesla, Inc. References to "Tesla" and vehicle models are solely for descriptive purposes.
tos.s6_content: Payments on this platform are processed by Paddle (Paddle.com Market Ltd), acting as our Merchant of Record. Paddle is responsible for transaction security, tax compliance, and billing.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1_content: We collect your email for account management and uploaded images for AI model inference.
privacy.s2_content: Your payment information (e.g., credit card numbers) is handled directly by Paddle. We do not store any sensitive financial data.
privacy.s3_content: We do not sell your personal data to third parties, except as required by law or necessary for service provision (e.g., payment processing).
privacy.s4_content: You may contact us at any time to request the deletion of your account and associated uploaded data.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.s1_content: Due to the instantaneous and irreversible nature of AI generation credits and digital downloads, all sales are generally final and non-refundable once credits are consumed or assets are delivered.
refund.s2_content: If a technical failure occurs (e.g., credit deduction without generation), please contact support@myteslab.com within 72 hours. We will restate credits after verification.
refund.s3_content: The Platform reserves the right of final interpretation regarding any refund requests or policy abuse.

Pricing.title: Top Up Your Credits
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for you. 5 credits per generation.

benefits.starter: Perfect for trying out new styles.
benefits.explorer: The best choice for most Tesla owners.
benefits.collector: For hardcore modders and creative minds.

values.collector: Unrestricted creativity at the best price

Pricing.secure_payment_desc: Secure payment processed by Paddle. One-time purchase, no subscription.

model-3.description: Discover premium Model 3 wrap ideas. From matte black to custom patterns, find the perfect look for your Tesla Model 3.

model-y.description: Explore custom Model Y wrap designs. Visualize colors and styles in 3D to transform your Tesla Model Y.

cybertruck.description: The ultimate collection of Cybertruck wrap designs. Preview futuristic skins and stainless steel alternatives in real-time.

model-s.description: Elegant and high-performance wrap designs for Tesla Model S. Enhance the luxury of your Model S with custom textures.

model-x.description: Unique Model X wrap inspiration. Preview designs with falcon wing doors and choose the best style for your Tesla Model X.

NotFound.title: Design Not Found
NotFound.desc: The Tesla wrap design you're looking for might have been moved or unpublished. But don't worry, there are plenty more to explore!
